src:
أول كفيف يتولى منصب في الأزهر: فقدان البصر لم يمنعني عن العمل الإداري.. صور
02 Nov 2019, 07:01 by محمد شحتة
محمد شحتة أكد الدكتور وجيه زكريا عمران، اول كفيف بجامعة الأزهر يتولى منصب وكيل كلية أصول الدين والدعوة بالزقازيق، أن الكفيف لا يعوقه شئ طالما كانت لديه الرغبة والقدرة على العمل الإداري، مشيرا إلى أن الإدارة تحتاج إلى سمات شخصية أكثر من كونها مجرد توقيع على ورق، فتحتاج إلى حكمة وحنكة وسرعة اتخاذ القرار ومواقف صارمة، كما أن الدستور أعطى الحق للكفيف بتولى أى منصب ومن يعوقه عن ذلك بسبب كونه كفيف عقوبته الحبس.وأضاف عمران لصدي البلد، ان رئيس مجلس الدولة كان في يوم من الأيام كفيف وهو المستشار نبيل مرهم، واختير بقرار من الجمعية العمومية وصدق على هذا القرار رئيس الجمهورية.وأشار إلى أن قيادات جامعة الأزهر كانوا داعمين لقرار توليتي لوكيل كلية أصول الدين والدعوة بالزقازيق من أول عميد الكلية الدكتور محمد عبد الرحيم البيومي حتى الدكتور محمد المحرصاوي رئيس الجامعة.وتابع: أتمنى أن ينتشر التعليم التكنولوجي في جامعة الأزهر وبالرغم من وجوده حاليا إلا أننا نريد أن ينتشر في كل الكليات وكذلك تبنى المواهب إلى حد توصيلها إلى المستوى الرفيع لها،وكذلك ضرورة وضع معايير لاختيار طلاب الكليات الشرعية في جامعة الأزهر.
text:
The Novo mesto Krka lost last night to the Littoral
02 Nov 2019, 07:35 by L.M., KK Krka
Novo mesto - Krka basketball players lost to Koper Primorska 71:89 in the 5th round of the ABA League at home last night.
ABA League, Round 5, 1.11.
Krka - Koper Primorska 71:89 (13:23, 15:22, 24:32, 19:12)
Krka: Cosey 15, Skedelj 4, Djapa 5, Fifolt 5, Balažić 2, Jošilo 20, Lapornik 9, Ramljak 8, Osolnik 3.
The Krka players started on Friday with Paolo Marinelli, Tim Osolnik, Marko Josilo, Ivan Ramljak and Žiga Fifolt. The guests led by two Harris triples and one Hodzic in the middle of the fifth minute by 12-5, and at 7:15 the first minute of the break was taken by Krka's coach Simon Petrov at the beginning of the 7th minute. It was 1:23 pm after ten minutes. The second half was opened by four consecutive points, and the coach Golemac also demanded a minute break. According to her, the guests scored 14 consecutive points and at 17:37 Petrov demanded a second minute break, which only partially interrupted the visitors' rush. They led by 17 points at halftime (28:45).



The second half opened with five consecutive points, but the visitors quickly changed their minds and again led by 19 points (60:41) at the end of the 26th minute and by 25 (77:52) after 30 minutes. In the last quarter Krka's only managed to narrow the gap slightly.

5x Krkin should:

Top scorer: Marko Jošilo 20
Most jumps: Dalibor Đapa and Žiga Fifolt 5
Max Assists: Glenn Cosey 5
Most balls won: Glenn Cosey 3
Most useful player (performance index): Marko Jošilo 22

Post-match Statements:

Simon Petrov, Krka's coach: “We were too tight in defense to count on a favorable outcome. We received too many points and that was the main reason we lost the match. We are looking for a new center and I think then our picture will be different. Congratulations to Primorski for their successful games this season. "
Jurica Golemac, Coach of Koper Primorska: »Congratulations to our team for winning. We controlled the match from the beginning. For the first twenty minutes we played superbly in defense. In the second half, we allowed our opponent to take a swing, but we were also excellent in the attack and that brought us a peaceful end to the game. "

New Krkašev matches




After five rounds in the ABA League, the Krka players have two wins and three losses. They will play their next game at home again on Monday, 11 November, at 18.00, when Belgrade's Mega Bemax arrives in Novo mesto. Even earlier, on Monday, November 4, at 7 pm, SKL's home match with Helios awaits.
Let us also add that the company Sandwich shop was a partner of the match, they prepared a prize game, and during the half-time, Rabbit Vinko entertained children and taught them basketball. The Novomog Majors were introduced, and loyal Celts supporters encouraged Krka's team with a new drum, which was purchased by the club.

In the attachment statement of trainers Simon Petrov and Dalibor Đapa.
